thread.title: Paula Constant - Walking the Sahara: Part 2
thread.title_full: Paula Constant - Walking the Sahara: Part 2

title: Paula Constant - Walking the Sahara: Part 2
text:
Paula Constant's life-defining two year trek saw her walk more than 12,000 kilometres across the Sahara. 
She crossed Mauritania, and then on to Mali and the fabled city of Timbuktu. 
Paula luxuriated in the silence of the desert, which she says is so complete she could hear her heartbeat. 
Her original plan was to walk all the way to Cairo, which proved impossible. 
In the years since she returned from her trek, Paula has given plenty of thought to the nature of success, and what it really means. 
Part two of a two-part episode 
Further information 
Paula's book Sahara: a journey of love, loss and survival is now out of print, but available as an e-Book at Amazon.com Duration: 51min 16sec Broadcast: Tue 31 Jan   Wed 25 Jan 2017, 12:51am Guests
